branch of medicine that is concerned with the treatment of injuries, diseases, and other disorders by manual and instrumental means. Surgery involves the management of acute...

vaccine

smallpox

acute infectious disease that begins with a high fever, headache, and back pain and then proceeds to an eruption on the skin that leaves the face and limbs covered with...

antimicrobial agent

any of a large variety of chemical compounds and physical agents that are used to destroy microorganisms or to prevent their development. The production and use of the...

immunization

process by which resistance to disease is acquired or induced in plants and animals. This discussion focuses on immunization against infectious diseases in vertebrate...
